name: tourismguide
description: Local Tourism Guide Webapp for WEB Technologies course at ORT Braude

scripts.build:ui: echo BUILDING UI && cd Tourism-Guide-UI && vite build
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:ui && npm run install:server
scripts.install:ui: echo Installing UI && cd Tourism-Guide-UI && npm install
scripts.install:server: echo Installing SERVER && cd Tourism-Guide-SERVER && npm install

author: Elad Goldenberg, Sapir Itzhak, Dmitry Smon, Idan Aizenberg and Hassan Said Ahmad
